mapper.insert: insert into Member(member_seq, member_id, member_nickname,member_name,member_address,member_phone,member_email,member_rating,member_password, member_follows, member_count) values(SEQ_MEMBER_MEMBER_SEQ.nextval,#{member_id},#{member_nickname},#{member_name},#{member_address},#{member_phone},#{member_email},'1',#{member_password},'',0)
mapper.update: update member set member_nickname=#{member_nickname}, member_name=#{member_name}, member_address=#{member_address}, member_phone=#{member_phone}, member_email=#{member_email}, member_profile=#{member_profile}, member_password=#{member_password}, member_path=#{member_path} where member_seq=#{member_seq}
mapper.select: select * from member where member_id=#{member_id} AND member_phone=#{member_phone}
